DocLocalization.Name: Opérateur 3D de transformation cartésienne non uniforme

DocAttribute.Name: Scale2
DocAttribute.Documentation: The scaling value specified for the transformation along the axis 2. This is normally the y scale factor.

DocAttribute.Name: Scale3
DocAttribute.Documentation: The scaling value specified for the transformation along the axis 3. This is normally the z scale factor.

DocAttribute.Name: Scl2
DocAttribute.Documentation: The derived scale S(2) of the transformation along the axis 2 (normally the y axis), equal to Scale2 if that exists, or equal to the derived Scl1 (normally the x axis scale factor) otherwise.

DocAttribute.Name: Scl3
DocAttribute.Documentation: The derived scale S(3) of the transformation along the axis 3 (normally the z axis), equal to Scale3 if that exists, or equal to the derived Scl1 (normally the x axis scale factor) otherwise.

DocWhereRule.Name: Scale2GreaterZero
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The derived scaling Scl2 shall be greater than zero.

DocWhereRule.Name: Scale3GreaterZero
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The derived scaling Scl3 shall be greater than zero.
